GatewayNetwork.description: The network settings for a gateway.

Name.description: The name of the network. This name is used to reference the network and must be unique among networks in this gateway.
Name.markdownDescription:
The name of the network. This name is used to reference the network and must be unique among networks in this gateway.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

CidrBlock.description: A unique IP address range to use for this network. These IP addresses should be in the form of a Classless Inter-Domain Routing (CIDR) block; for example, 10.0.0.0/16.
CidrBlock.markdownDescription:
A unique IP address range to use for this network. These IP addresses should be in the form of a Classless Inter-Domain Routing (CIDR) block; for example, 10.0.0.0/16.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

GatewayNetwork.markdownDescription:
The network settings for a gateway.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.description: The name of the gateway. This name can not be modified after the gateway is created.
Name.markdownDescription:
The name of the gateway. This name can not be modified after the gateway is created.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: Replacement

EgressCidrBlocks.description: The range of IP addresses that contribute content or initiate output requests for flows communicating with this gateway. These IP addresses should be in the form of a Classless Inter-Domain Routing (CIDR) block; for example, 10.0.0.0/16.

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

EgressCidrBlocks.markdownDescription:
The range of IP addresses that contribute content or initiate output requests for flows communicating with this gateway. These IP addresses should be in the form of a Classless Inter-Domain Routing (CIDR) block; for example, 10.0.0.0/16.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: Replacement

Networks.description: The list of networks in the gateway.
Networks.markdownDescription:
The list of networks in the gateway.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: Replacement

GatewayArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the gateway.
GatewayArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the gateway.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

GatewayState.description: The current status of the gateway.
GatewayState.markdownDescription:
The current status of the gateway.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: CREATING | ACTIVE | UPDATING | ERROR | DELETING | DELETED  
Update requires: No interruption
